Date: 2025-01-30 16:07
Subject: The Greenhouse Open Day, Farm Rio sale, Swarovski x Ariana Grande, Register for the Seminar, JACQUEMUS Sale, Join our focus groups, Weekly hot jobs, VoP reminder, Tech Away Day
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Celebrating Intrapreneurship

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D198%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C641f36abb87a43eb05e908dd4126b956%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638738356758884878%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=YiVIXEJof%2FodL%2Bz%2Bi5AqTAepOkSNIfuJDVB82dnK0Vw%3D&reserved=0> 	
The IBTIKAR Training Program wrapped up its first-ever cohort! Over 16 weeks, 13 colleagues learned to think and act like entrepreneurs, mastering the journey from ideation and problem identification to solution validation, financing, and pitching. The program transformed entrepreneurial tools into a hands-on learning experience, ending in a Demo Day at The Greenhouse on January 23rd, a celebration of growth, creativity, and innovation.

Enjoy a flat 60% off selected items in store and online from today until the 4th of February.
To access the sale, log in using your Chalhoub Group credentials online or visit the JACQUEMUS boutique in Dubai Mall. The discount will be applied automatically at check-out.

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D203%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C641f36abb87a43eb05e908dd4126b956%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638738356758998868%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2BphFY7VLq2zXdRCZXbPpABh7Sf5zLZ71%2BQPKdL%2FCk7Y%3D&reserved=0>

HELP SHAPE HR ON ONE CHALHOUB

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D204%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C641f36abb87a43eb05e908dd4126b956%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638738356759018452%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=xxaa0tFUlStbh1VuUmqKp0vWSbdcXrgqRgrqBQZq%2BX4%3D&reserved=0> 	

Phase 2 of the One Chalhoub rollout is here, and we’re excited to bring HR features to the platform! Join us in virtual sessions the week of Feb 3rd to help shape a seamless and user-friendly experience. In these sessions, we invite you to share feedback on HR needs and challenges, review upcoming features, and collaborate on ideas.

As we step into a new year, it's time to reflect on your workplace experience and share your insights by participating in the Voice of the People Survey.

Your honest feedback will help us celebrate what we’re doing well and identify areas where we can grow and improve together.

The survey is voluntary, confidential, and will only take about 10 minutes to complete. All responses will be reported collectively, ensuring your privacy.

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to your people partner or contact us at People.Experience@chalhoub.com.

Take the survey! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D220%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C641f36abb87a43eb05e908dd4126b956%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638738356759307655%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AYkLEiAffK4uRleCPQfV5xSM9dbFQ9heZoF2579eQhk%3D&reserved=0>

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/07-4-min.png> 	

Tech Away Day 2025

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D221%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C641f36abb87a43eb05e908dd4126b956%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638738356759321323%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=JsMZlkaL0UvrzVwI9PtWSRPcwX%2B3m28jYkAI%2FhdDuYI%3D&reserved=0> 	

Group Tech & Data hosted its annual Away Day. with the theme “Collaboration and Innovation.” The day was packed with a showcase of latest advancements in AI, innovative ideas to improve processes and celebration of collective and individual outstanding achievements. Kamran Abbasi, Chief Data and Technology Officer, emphasised upon the pivotal role of Tech & Data in driving AI, automation, and digital-first strategies. 
It was an opportunity to share ideas, spark creativity, and strengthen how we work as a team alongside our Business partners. Shout out to Chalhoub University for their support!

Watch the recap!  <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D221%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C641f36abb87a43eb05e908dd4126b956%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638738356759336824%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=jd1Q8sSochoDadgthSmw%2Bb%2Btx1AH3zH097b%2B8b7sZsI%3D&reserved=0>
